message: Welcome! Our products come with a satisfaction guarantee. While this one is of lower quality, it still offers value at our fixed price of $10000. We stand by our products and are confident you'll find utility in it. Let us know if you have any questions.
I'd like to decline the offer. I'm not convinced about the value of the product at this price point.
